short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A very simple Twitch enhancer, by Noctumsempra.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions aims to extend functionalities of Twitch streaming experience in the browser.

For example, when Twitch platform exposes an error to the user, it does it in an obstrusive way: streaming get interrupted showing a black overlay with a message and a button inside, WAITING for the user to PRESS IT, hence forcing the user to interrump any other activity to reload/resume the streaming.

In this first release of "Twitchsempra" extension, a NEW APPROACH has been taken: when an error occurs, this extension turns that static error message into a 5 sec. floating notification while the streaming reloads AUTOMATICALLY as many times as needed without the need of user pressing a button to reload it, saving aforementioned user precious time.

More features are yet to come:

* Button for manually refreshing the stream (only the stream, not the entire page).
* Detection of "Loading" hangups & stream refresh.
* Foldable event log.
* Clicking message/username in chat to immediate reply to people (no more slippery arrows)
* and many more!

I hope you enjoy it.
